item.description:
Come and join us for lunch at Mandarin Reading. They have an awesome buffet which includes dinner, soup, sushi and dessert! It's simple to get to, immediately off of route 95. There's plenty of parking too. As usual, we'll be wearing a lei so you can find us. I'll be the one with the frozen pina colada! To see the menu and get directions, here's a link to the Mandarin website. See you there!

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Fabulous Food and Friendly Conversation
